name: Gigi and The Little Ones Search for the lost Fairies
name_original: Gigi and The Little Ones Search for the lost Fairies
description: Follow a girl named Gigi as she goes on a journey of self discovery, coming of age and discovering the wonderful world of fairies. Spend your time battle knights solving puzzles and exploring strange new and ancient civilizations. Based on the book Gigi and The Little Ones. Feel free to offer suggestions feedback of any kind and implementations you would like to see in the game. I am always willing to listen and collaborate with others also!
